remarks: A general version of ~ cvmlift .  If ` K ` is simply connected and weakly locally path-connected, then there is a unique lift of functions on ` K ` which commutes with the covering map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2015.)
statement:
cvmlift3.b $e |- B = U. C $.
cvmlift3.y $e |- Y = U. K $.
cvmlift3.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C CovMap J ) ) $.
cvmlift3.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. SCon ) $.
cvmlift3.l $e |- ( ph -> K e. N-Locally PCon ) $.
cvmlift3.o $e |- ( ph -> O e. Y ) $.
cvmlift3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( K Cn J ) ) $.
cvmlift3.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. B ) $.
cvmlift3.e $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` P ) = ( G ` O ) ) $.
cvmlift3 $p |- ( ph -> E! f e. ( K Cn C ) ( ( F o. f ) = G /\ ( f ` O ) = P ) ) $.
